website_summaries.verdict: Available in many colors, this cable stands out for its tough braided casing and two useful USB ports, allowing it to meet multiple types of charging needs at once.
pros: Available in four lengths and an impressive 12 different colors
Provides power to any device with a standard grounded cord, and offers two high-speed USB ports to directly charge smartphones and other devices
Braided cord casing is tough enough to stand up to heavy use without wear
cons: The head of the cord is bulky, and may not fit well into outlets tucked away behind furniture or other objects

customer_reviews.title: USB's Don't Work
customer_reviews.text: This extension cord is used at home only and I normally work in an office. Working from home and just tried the 2 USB's to charge my cell phone and neither one of them work. It's a little over 2 months old, it must not have ever worked. Now it's too late to return. Other than this issue, I like the product, but I'm not able to fully utilize the features paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Sean K. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Just click 'buy now.'
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an extension cord that wasn't 'ugly.' I'm so pleased with my purchase... These are awesome! They quickly charge multiple devices. My favorite part is the durability - a scratch-resistant (rubber-ish) port, perfect for hardwood floors. I love the braided cord in a color that matches my room. No need to hide it behind furniture or keep against the wall, out of sight. I purchased this and another. Will be back for more!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than expected.
customer_reviews.text: LIke how it works and works very well. However, it's much heavier (in wt.) than I expected. I wanted it for traveling so that I could plug in devices closer to hotel beds, and it works well for that, but its pretty heavy and stiff; but I guess that is what should be expected.
customer_reviews.author: TwoHerbs Workshop

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I wish I would have know about these earlier. My husband and I struggle with having enough places bedside for lamps, Apple Watches, iPhones, humidifiers, diffusers, etc. One of these extension cords each completely remedied that problem. I also love that it has the ability to be mounted to the wall or something else. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan E. Hall

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know why I didn’t purchase this year’s ago
customer_reviews.text: If you’re a parent with multiple children with cell phones or any form of technology this is a blood pressure reducer/sanity keeper. Or anyone who has a room with limited electrical outlet access. Worth every penny I spent just for the peace of mind having electrical outlets and USB ports in one plug.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Murray

customer_reviews.title: Good form and function
customer_reviews.text: Low profile plug works well where wall power is behind furniture. Cube shape for outlets is space efficient and makes it easy to find under a desk or bookcase. USB charger ports (way cool!) work with Apple and Android tablets and phones. Braided cable is sturdy and looks deco
customer_reviews.author: mtgeek

customer_reviews.title: Works great, larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what I was expecting, but I was surprised to find that the plug head of this extension cord is about the size of a lime. That didn't prevent its usefulness, but in my mind I had pictured something much smaller. It's worked well to help solve the eternal issue of not having enough outlets in old houses, while being a little cuter than your normal extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Electrical extension that cover the bases
customer_reviews.text: This power extension is built to take hard usage. The flat face plug (to the outlet) is wonderful. The output head is designed for an mounting option to the wall. All in all, well thought out. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas K. Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Cube part is HUGE - not decorative if you have MCM furniture off the floor
customer_reviews.text: The cube is HUGE - if you have MCM furniture or Scandanavien furniture that is off the floor it really ruins the look (have Barcelona chair knockoffs and it looked like crud underneath).
customer_reviews.author: wellson

customer_reviews.title: Made in China - ‘Nuff Said
customer_reviews.text: Junk! What can possibly go wrong with a power cord? Answer: Made in China. One of the plug ports was bent/welded shut and could not accommodate a plug. Defective in design, materials and assembly using inferior raw materials with non-existent quality control. I would NOT trust this plug to NOT start a fire.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My highest speed charger. Even faster than using an iPad charger on an iPhone (Great trick). High quality. Love the cord (never thought I would say that!) Everybody who sees it thinks its cool. Its a cord!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Goedken

customer_reviews.title: Intresting cord
customer_reviews.text: I use this on the outside deck so we can plug it all in and hang out. Note that the head of the cord is HUGE, if you need self defense you can use it for a weapon.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Big Fat Sturdy Cord
customer_reviews.text: Only measurement for the cord used on this extension plug was gauge. . . I was quite surprised to see the braided wire quite stout . . 3/8-1/2 inch diameter so it doesn't go around corners very well.
customer_reviews.author: SuzJonE

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, its pretty. It's functional of course, and works as it should, but more importantly it looks nice in my bedroom. So far I haven't had any problems loading it up with items!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Fashionable Power Strip alternative
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous addition to your interior decor for locations where you just cant hide a cord. I selected a color combination that fit with my bedroom palette because I did not want to see an ugly cord hanging from my bedside table every day. This USB and standard outlets come in very handy for charging and the flat plug fits nicely behind furniture.
customer_reviews.author: gisele geiger

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Fast Charger
customer_reviews.text: We have ours running under the couch powering our router, floor lamp, a laptop charger, and two iPhone/iPad chargers. Our iPhones charge quickly, and we can watch stuff on our iPad Pro when it is plugged in and charging.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Bidwell

customer_reviews.title: All Around Great Plug
customer_reviews.text: See what I did there with the all around? ;) you’re welcome. Haha anyway, I love this! Way bigger than I expected but hey it works and it looks cute while doing it. I’m 5’3 and I would say it’s about fist sized. (If those things help at all, I’ve been told I have relatively small hands)
customer_reviews.author: Lexxington

customer_reviews.title: Love these for the hard to reach plugs
customer_reviews.text: These are nice to use for the nightstand, and they look a little nicer than a regular plug strip. The usb plug comes in handy!!
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to get closer charging access to the favorite chair. It works as expected and up to our standards.
customer_reviews.author: Swimnmom

customer_reviews.title: Useful extension cord
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and works well. Head is a little bigger than expected. Don't plan to mount it under a table/workspace - you won't be able to access all of the ports.
customer_reviews.author: Huntster

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Cute and effective
customer_reviews.text: One of my best purchases of 2018. Quit wasting your energy looking for the plug behind the couch. Just get this thing. It's definitely better looking than your average surge protector and it stays out the way.
customer_reviews.author: Pris

customer_reviews.title: Works well in crowded rooms
customer_reviews.text: Flat plug head great for tight spaces. Cord is really long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wife likes it.
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but neat indoor extension cord. Be sure to pay a little more for the better USB charger if that feature is a factor for you.
customer_reviews.author: HeyWatchThis

customer_reviews.title: High quality, but no mistake, the receptacle is big...
customer_reviews.text: Tennis ball big. But enough amps to charge my ipad. Nice looking cord blends in with our wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: no8ing

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this “extension cord” stylish it is wildly convenient!!
customer_reviews.author: rj

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable and durable.
customer_reviews.text: The cube material is thick, durable and scratch resistant. So you don’t have to worry that it will crack or break if you accidentally drop it. And the cord look nice and fashionable. I use this when I do hair in weddings on location.
customer_reviews.author: Cypress G

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly and product is just as described. I love having the usb ports to charge electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: It can also be used as a flail-like midieval weapon.
customer_reviews.author: GrizzlyEngine

customer_reviews.title: Love it but...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, but for the price, the three prong plug should be able to rotate 360 degrees. Otherwise, it can be awkward or unusable in some situations.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Silverstone

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy with high output USB ports. Very useful design! Edges are rubber so it will stay on a table or desk without too much trouble
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Paying for looks
customer_reviews.text: Bit pricey, but it it looks good to have out compared to a standard power strip.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love the pink color and the various charging options. The cord is super long and durable.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome cord. Absolutely beautiful. I get many comments. Can you imagine getting a compliment on an extension cord?
customer_reviews.author: therealtomrose

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: Not all of the outlets seem to work all the time?
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Ralston

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Design
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this extension cord. It is a light pink and the design is ingenious. I haven’t had it too long yet, so I’m not sure of the cord’s durability. But it certainly looks and feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: CalGirl

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Kids like it as they can plug in their phones and iPods into the USB charging ports and other electronics in the outlets. Charges much faster then using a 10 ft lightning connector
customer_reviews.author: Heisenberg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for my wife and myself to set by the nightstand. Reduced the number of adapted needed to charge phone and Apple Watch with the use of the two usb plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Davison

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The rubberized edges make it so I don’t have to worry about dropping it on hardwood floors. I love the USB ports, the only way to make this any better would be to have more USB ports on the top, maybe have 4 instead of 2.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Chlebowski

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, usb doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. Unfortunately, like others, the usb charging ports stopped working after about a month of owning.
customer_reviews.author: Jvan

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Style is awesome. Works great fast charge for our Samsung S8+ phones.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Great looks, great function. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Nobody likes unsightly cords, and when you aren't able to hide them, this is the best option I've found
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but other than that I love it, its my new travel companion .
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Thinking of getting a second cord.
customer_reviews.text: I found my computer charger cord is too short to reach most peoples plug outlets when travelling. Delighted to find this 12-foot cord in great colour range and I can also charge my USB device. Works great and easy to coil up to put in my computer bag.
customer_reviews.author: Meesa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent extension cord
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has several things she plugs in and always has an extension cord. I saw this product and thought it was unique and decided to order it. I'm so happy I did! It is very durable, the cord is thick, and the cord has a nice blue color. Very happy with product!
customer_reviews.author: SA

product_meta.title: 360 Electrical 360517 Habitat Braided Extension Cord w/ 3.4A Dual USB, 12 ft, Modern - Gold,
feature_bullets: 3.4a dual USB ports fast-charge a tablet and a smartphone
Low-profile, right-angle plug fits in tight spaces
12′ power cord puts power where you need it
12 colors to choose from for every taste and style

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars132 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
